wijethunga mahaththayage me abirahas ghathanayata ohuge sahodarayekuge ha ema sahodarayage diyaniyak wiwahakara ganime apekshawen pasuwana tharunayakuge sambandhayak thibena bawa kiyamin polisiyata nirnamika pethsamda labi thibune me sambandhayen parikshana sidukaragena yana atharawarayeya.polisiyata labi thibuna ee pethsam osseda parikshanayak sidu kala athara me ghathanayata owun dedenage kisima sambandhayak nomathi bawa thahawuruwi atha.wijethunga mahaththayage ghathakaya gana kisima hoduwawak soya ganimata nohakiwiya.kuliyapitiya kottasaya bara polis adhikari saman sigera mahatha wishramika upapolis parikshakawarayage ghathakayan alla ganime wagakima pawaruwe kuliyapitiya kottasa aparadha wimarshana eekakaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka pushpitha gunarathna mahathataya.polis adhikari sigera mahathage magapenwima yatathe parikshana aarambha kala polis parikshaka pushpitha mahatha pradhana polis kandayama bingiriya bala pitathwa gos aththe wijethunga mahaththayage ghathakayan gana monayam ho hoduwawak soyagena idiri parikshanawalata potak pada ganimataya.wishramika upapolis parikshakawaraya jangama durakathanayak pawichchi karanawada kiya soya balimedi ohu kittuwen asuru kala aya polis kandayamata pawasa aththe ewani durakathanayak pawichchi nokala bawaya.eheth game siti ek ayek wijethunga mahaththaya dawasak ka samaga ho jangama durakathanayakin katha karanawa daka thibu nisa ohu ee bawa polis parikshaka pushpitha mahatha ekka pawasa atha.
